Articles.Content:
You must create a plane that can fit into a kerbodyne tank and must fly to at least 10,000 on kerbin.

It must have no infinite gliding, dropping parts, cheats, or anything else I have not thought of.

You must make it stock parts but I will allow one exception, mechjeb.

My entry is at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88762-Micro-plane but it flew in version .23 so it might no work now but it was designed for duna and it will not count.

Leader board (based on height, manuverability, and how many kerbals it seats)

1.

2.

3.

Edited August 31, 2014 by LABHOUSE
Could you maybe describe the challenge a bit more? Are there no rules? And you might want to post your own entry to your challenge and post a leaderboard to encourage other players to participate.
